Name: Battery Thermal

Description.String: Import or enter battery environment temperature in degrees Celsius for each time step.

Items.StringList: Enter a single fixed temperature|Enter time series temperature data

Caption.String: Compute battery surface area as cube

The battery thermal model does not account for power required for thermal conditioning. Use the inputs under "Battery Losses" or on the Losses page to account for power used by battery heating or cooling equipment.

The battery thermal model assumes that the battery with specific heat Cp is in an environment at the specified environment temperature. Heat transfer between the battery and its environment is proportional to the heat transfer coefficient h.
The time series environment temperature array must match the timestep of the selected weather file. For hybrid systems, the length of the array must match the smallest timestep weather file.

batt_thermal_choice.Label: Environment temp option
batt_thermal_choice.IndexLabels: Enter single fixed temperature|Enter time series temperature
